content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Scope:

Leak Test Apparatus is a solid state instrument designed for the leakage testing of food, drug and other industrial chemical products. The instrument is used to test the quality of packing processes in strips, blisters and sachets containing tablets, granulates and liquids. They are also used to check that the seals enclosing the product are perfectly intact.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Construction:

RASAYAN leak test apparatus are constructed out of heavy gauge M.S. sheet duly powder coated. (Complete S.S also available. Kindly mention the same at the time of order). Unit equipped with microprocessor based 4 digits seven segments LED display with soft touch key provide a convenient user interface. Dedicated start and stop button for easy operating.

Unit contains polypropylene / Polycarbonate vacuum desiccators to sustain vacuum for long time. Compaq vacuum pump for creating high level of vacuum in short time. Vacuum gauge in front of panel for indicating vacuum inside desiccator from

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1400″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_border” image_hovers=”false”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1399″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_border” image_hovers=”false”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”1401″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_border” image_hovers=”false”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Salient Features

  • Test the integrity of strips, blisters and bottles
  • Large LED electronic countdown timer
  • Set vacuum and soak timer
  • Built-in rugged, oil-free vacuum pump
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Technical specs.

Vacuum range 150- 600 mm of Hg.
Desiccator 6”, 10”, 12” (Please specify while ordering)
Display 4-Digit Seven Segment Bright Red LED Display
Keyboard Soft touch keys
Hold Time 1 – 9999 Sec.
Power 230V ±10% AC, 50Hz, 10W
Weight 13 Kg. (Approx.)
Accessories Main Apparatus along with vacuum pump polypropylene/
Polycarbonate desiccator along with connecting tubes, Operation manual.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
